verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <WH5329> A Psalm <WH4210> for the sons <WH1121> of Korah. <WH7141> O clap <WH8628> your hands, <WH3709> all <WH3605> ye people; <WH5971> shout <WH7321> unto God <WH430> with the voice <WH6963> of triumph. <WH7440>
For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> most high <WH5945> is terrible; <WH3372> he is a great <WH1419> King <WH4428> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
He shall subdue <WH1696> the people <WH5971> under <WH8478> us, and the nations <WH3816> under <WH8478> our feet. <WH7272>
He shall choose <WH977> <WH853> our inheritance <WH5159> for us, <WH853> the excellency <WH1347> of Jacob <WH3290> whom <WH834> he loved. <WH157> Selah. <WH5542>
God <WH430> is gone up <WH5927> with a shout, <WH8643> the LORD <WH3068> with the sound <WH6963> of a trumpet. <WH7782>
Sing praises <WH2167> to God, <WH430> sing praises: <WH2167> sing praises <WH2167> unto our King, <WH4428> sing praises. <WH2167>
For <WH3588> God <WH430> is the King <WH4428> of all <WH3605> the earth: <WH776> sing ye praises <WH2167> with understanding. <WH7919>
God <WH430> reigneth <WH4427> over <WH5921> the heathen: <WH1471> God <WH430> sitteth <WH3427> upon <WH5921> the throne <WH3678> of his holiness. <WH6944>

The princes <WH5081> of the people <WH5971> are gathered together, <WH622> even the people <WH5971> of the God <WH430> of Abraham: <WH85> for <WH3588> the shields <WH4043> of the earth <WH776> belong unto God: <WH430> he is greatly <WH3966> exalted. <WH5927>
